verbose_text: Wester and co-workers successfully developed a radiolabelled CXCR4-ligand ([68 Ga] Pentixafor) for PET imaging XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR that we and others reported as a proof-of-concept for the visualization of CXCR4 expression in patients with hematologic as well as solid malignancies XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR.
